title: Hair Trends Bollywood Actresses Have Been Rocking, At Recent Appearances
text:
Prev Next With award season on, and a bunch of new films releasing, Bollywood stars are currently channelling their best fashion and beauty game. And, of course, with all their new looks, the actresses are setting some serious trends. Check out the latest hair trends your favourite filmy divas have been rocking, at their most recent appearances and at award events. 
Alia Bhatt 
While winning awards and appreciation, the actress has been rocking a low teased ponytail that suits her so damn well. 
Sonakshi Sinha 
Sonakshi has been working the face-framing top knot, in her shot for Dabboo Ratnani’s calendar, as well as on the 62nd JIO Filmfare Awards red carpet. 
Kriti Sanon 
Kriti has been making waves (quite literally) with her amazing hair at all her recent appearances. Plus, she’s been playing up the wavy-haired look with braids and a top knot. 
Disha Patani 
If we had hair as beautiful as Disha’s, we too would love to play around with voluminous hairstyles like she does. 
Karisma Kapoor 
Karisma is also a fan of the ponytail, like Alia. But she prefers a higher, more face-framing style instead. 
Swara Bhaskar 
Swara seems to be a fan of keeping her hair away from her face (a feeling we’re totally familiar with), rocking variations of an updo at her recent appearances. 
Sonam Kapoor 
Sonam’s loose waves are the stuff dreams are made of! 
Parineeti Chopra
